original_text: The word which Jeremiah the prophet commanded Seraiah the son of Neriah, the son of Maaseiah, when he went with Zedekiah the king of Judah into Babylon in the fourth year of his reign. And this Seraiah was a quiet prince.
korean_text: 유다의 시드기야 왕 제사년에 마세야의 손자 네리야의 아들 스라야가 그 왕과 함께 바벨론으로 갈 때에 선지자 예레미야가 그에게 말씀을 명령하니 스라야는 병참감이더라

sentences.original_text: The word which Jeremiah the prophet commanded
Seraiah son of Neriah, son of Maaseiah
when he went with Zedekiah king of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 유다 왕 시드기야와 함께 갔을 때

sentences.original_text: into Babylon in the fourth year of his reign
And this Seraiah was a quiet prince
